name: M4ZE
description:
It's late at night. You, a ball, are finishing up the papers for your thesis. Maybe it is over... Maybe, after this, you shall return to your friends, crack open a cold one and enjoy life, or maybe... Maybe...

The wind picks up and, out of nowhere, a magical force spreads your thesis papers all over the faculty. "What is this", you ask yourself. But there is no time to answer: something is lurking in the dark. 

"The... the janitor.".

Can you survive the challenge and collect all your papers before you escape or are you doomed to never finish your thesis?
